name: Bad Cat: Slippers Annihilation
description:
Bad Cat : Slippers Annihilation

This game was created as part of "One Minute Game jam #5"

The main character, a bad cat who likes to piss in slippers!

Your task is to wet as many slippers as possible in 60 seconds!

But be careful, you will be disturbed by an angry hostess who does not like your antics, if she catches you, you will lose!

Also in the game there are points.

For every wet slippers you get +300 points.

For the cake you get +100 points and a speed boost for 3 seconds

Cats don't like broccoli, so it slows you down for 3 seconds and takes away as much as 300 points!

Mouse control, left or right button. To exit full screen mode, press Ctrl, to exit the menu Esc

The game was developed by 2 people AmaiDonatsu and OffSide.
Link to the AmaiDonatsu user page
https://amaidonatsu.itch.io/

You can also download assets from our game for free

https://amaidonatsu.itch.io/badcat-assets

Sounds were made with rFXGen https://raylibtech.itch.io/rfxgen

Thanks for the music to the user with the nickname Zakiro

https://zakiro101.itch.io/free-casual-game-music-pack-vol-2
